name: touch
example_en: She gently touched the petals of the flower.
memory_tips: 词源：来自古法语 'touchier'，意为触摸。联想记忆：想象你的手指轻轻触碰柔软的花瓣，感受那种细腻的触感。图像记忆：想象一个孩子好奇地触摸一只温顺的小猫。

image_prompt.main_image: A close-up of a hand gently touching the soft petals of a blooming flower, with sunlight filtering through the background.
image_prompt.example_image: A young girl with a curious expression gently touching a small, fluffy kitten sitting on a wooden table.

collocations: touch screen (触摸屏); light touch (轻触); touch base (联系)
